#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
 
using namespace std;
 
int comp(const void *p1, const void *p2) {
	return ( *(char *)p1 - *(char *)p2 );
}
 
bool are_anagrams(const char *s1, const char *s2) {
	int l1 = strlen(s1), l2 = strlen(s2);
	if(l1 != l2) return false;
 
	char cs1[l1+1];
	char cs2[l2+1];
 
	strcpy(cs1, s1);
	strcpy(cs2, s2);
	
	qsort(cs1, l1, sizeof(char), comp);
	qsort(cs2, l2, sizeof(char), comp);
 
	//cout << "After sorting: " << endl;
	//cout << "S1: " << cs1 << " S2: " << cs2 << endl;
	
	for(int i=0; i<l1; i++)
		if( *(cs1+i) != *(cs2+i) )
			return false;
	return true;
}
 
int main() {
	int n;
	cin >> n;
	string result[n]; 
	for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {
		string s1, s2;
		cin >> s1 >> s2;
		if(are_anagrams(s1.c_str(), s2.c_str()))
			result[i] = "YES";
		else
			result[i] = "NO";
	}
 
	for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
		cout << result[i] << endl;
}
